title: Opinion?
body: Who would win a fight between morde and sion. the undead conquerer vs the undead king killer.

replies.body:
IT'S YOU. I FOUND YOU. :D


Lol I have to make this post on topic so it isn't against the rules. I would bet my money on the Kaiser. They're both mid-late game oriented but I'd say Morde's is more reliable.
hello friend, and yeah, i agree on that, but sion is more than capable of putting a dent in morde early.

If the Mordekaiser is smart and can time his W for sustain as well as land the Q and E poke

Sion will know death once again

The once Mordekaiser gets Rylais... GG
morde also has no mobility beyond that one thing, so sion passive could wreck him
